data.text: Wɛlɛ keela wooi ʋa GALA goo wo nui Zelemi sɔlɔɔni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya, é lo Filisiti nuiti ba. Naa ɠɛɛni aisa Falaɠɔn ʋa laalɛ Gaza wu.
Ta-zoo wolaiti polokagi lugi é ɠulazu zooi ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ ma yee zeelia ga Filisiti nuiti pɛ ma zuwu ɠaaleʋe,
Wa ɠɛɛzu ma: Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi ɠa looɠosu yeelɛ?
Kɛlɛ toɠa zoo é looɠo ɠale?
